title: Heat Transfer Optimization: Applications of Aluminum Alloy Nanocomposites

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental thermodynamics and materials science concepts
context.additional_context: Heat Transfer Application-Centered Education Focusing on Industrial and Daily Life Scenarios

learning_goals: An optimized heat transfer experimental model can be constructed using the Box-Behnken design technique.
The correlation between nanocomposite components (AA7072/AA7075) and heat transfer efficiency can be explained.
Thermal performance influencing factors can be evaluated through machine learning-based sensitivity analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
